string-array.item: Placed above the Ghutra to be fixed
Lined with wool, worn in winter to prevent cold
One type of traditional Bedouin fabric
Used in hair coloring and beard coloring,It is also used to beautify hands for women
The pot used to serve coffee in the Arabs
Made of leather, worn in the foot, was famous for the Arabs

A tool used for lighting and decoration

Arabic dress worn heavily in the Gulf States
It is the glass cup where the tea is placed
